question: Hi.  I saw my doctor last week and he told me that I need to exercise more and drink more water.  I started doing both, but I forgot the reason why I stopped drinking as much water is because if I drink as much as he says (6-8 glasses a day) I am constantly peeing.  I can drink a glass of water and have a full bladder 10 minutes later, and then be thirsty again.  I also find this happens at night.I have been tested for sugar diabetes in the past year when I mentioned I had problems with excessive thirst (negative) , but nobody mentioned insipidis.  I have had a couple of concussions.
title: diabetes insipidis?
